mapper.insert:
insert into inpt_nurse_third (id,hosp_code, visit_id, baby_id, record_time, in_num, temperature_code, temperature, temperature_retest, pulse, heart_rate, blood_sugar, is_ventilator, breath, forty_up_code, forty_up_remark, thirty_five_down_code, thirty_five_down_remark, intake, output, other_output, skin_code, remark, excrement_code, pee_code, height, weight, girth, am_bp, pm_bp, is_operation, operation_days, operation_cnt, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, drug_allergy) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.visitId}, #{item.babyId}, #{item.recordTime}, #{item.inNum}, #{item.temperatureCode}, #{item.temperature}, #{item.temperatureRetest}, #{item.pulse}, #{item.heartRate}, #{item.bloodSugar}, #{item.isVentilator}, #{item.breath}, #{item.fortyUpCode}, #{item.fortyUpRemark}, #{item.thirtyFiveDownCode}, #{item.thirtyFiveDownRemark}, #{item.intake}, #{item.output}, #{item.otherOutput}, #{item.skinCode}, #{item.remark}, #{item.excrementCode}, #{item.peeCode}, #{item.height}, #{item.weight}, #{item.girth}, #{item.amBp}, #{item.pmBp}, #{item.isOperation}, #{item.operationDays}, #{item.operationCnt}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.drugAllergy})
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(record_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as record_time from inpt_nurse_third where forty_up_code = '4'
and visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}
ORDER BY record_time desc limit 1
ORDER BY record_time

select a.visit_id, c.aac001, c.medical_reg_no, b.patient_code, b.in_dept_id, b.name, (select code from base_dept bd where b.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code and b.in_dept_id = bd.id) as in_dept_code, b.in_dept_name, b.in_ward_id, (select name from base_dept bd where b.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code and b.in_ward_id = bd.id) as in_ward_name, b.bed_name, b.in_disease_id, (select code from base_disease bd where b.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code and b.in_disease_id = bd.id) as in_disease_code, b.in_disease_name, b.in_time as in_time_batch, b.out_time, a.record_time, (date_format(a.record_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) as record_date, a.breath, a.is_ventilator, a.pulse, a.heart_rate, a.blood_sugar, a.temperature, a.am_bp, a.weight, a.girth, a.height, a.crte_name, a.crte_time from inpt_nurse_third a left join inpt_visit b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.visit_id = b.id left join insure_individual_visit c on b.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and b.id = c.visit_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.visit_id = #{visitId} and (a.pulse is not null or a.breath is not null or a.heart_rate is not null)
and (a.baby_id is null or LENGTH(TRIM(a.baby_id)) < 1)

update.foreach:
update inpt_nurse_third
intake = #{dto.intake}, output = #{dto.output}, remark = #{dto.remark}, skin_code = #{dto.skinCode}, excrement_code = #{dto.excrementCode}, pee_code = #{dto.peeCode}, height = #{dto.height}, weight = #{dto.weight}, girth = #{dto.girth}, am_bp = #{dto.amBp}, pm_bp = #{dto.pmBp}, is_operation = #{dto.isOperation}, operation_days = #{dto.operationDays}, operation_cnt = #{dto.operationCnt}, drug_allergy = #{dto.drugAllergy},
where visit_id = #{dto.visitId} and hosp_code = #{dto.hospCode} and date_format(record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{dto.recordTime},'%Y-%m-%d')

mapper.select:
SELECT dates.date, T.sjd, CONCAT( dates.date, ' ', T.sjd, ':00' ) time_slot, CONCAT( dates.date, ' ', T.sjd, ':00' ) record_time FROM ( SELECT a.date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') - INTERVAL ( a.a + ( 10 * b.a ) + ( 100 * c.a ) ) DAY AS date
FROM ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS a CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS b CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS c ) a WHERE a.Date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') ) dates LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.path, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',',- 1 ), ':00' ) AS sjd FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT VALUE AS sjd FROM sys_parameter WHERE CODE = 'HLSCD_KSSJ' AND hosp_code = #{hospCode} ) AS path FROM DUAL ) a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH( a.path ) - LENGTH( REPLACE ( a.path, ',', '' )) + 1 ) ) T ON 1 = 1
